entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a person who has Transfiguration notes and is able to recall them.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is trying to figure out the source of his unsettled feeling.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone Hagrid would never betray.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Hermione's ability to recall Transfiguration notes, indicating that he values her knowledge and expertise.
Hagrid is loyal to Dumbledore, as indicated by the fact that Hagrid would never betray him.
